entry.title: Hung like a Frame
entry.summary:
Author: TastyTaboo

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,260Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 12

Summary: Dick lets out a soft, satisfied sound and relaxes further into the ropework. He isn’t in subspace — this kind of thing doesn’t take him there the way it does Jason — but he is the best subject for this kind of fine detailed work and it feels right in a way. He’s the first Robin, Bruce Wayne’s first ward, and the first person Damian ever tied up.DamiDick Summer Week 6: Bondage & Painter/Muse
